Class AbstractJsonAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javasimon.console.Action
      • org.javasimon.console.action.AbstractJsonAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DetailJsonAction, ListJsonAction, PluginsJsonAction, TreeJsonAction

    public abstract class AbstractJsonAction
extends Action
